metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items not committed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Stock transport order items not committed") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items without stock transport requisition reference
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Stock transport order items without stock transport requisition reference") * 100

metrics.name: Overdue stock transport order items created but not (fully) delivered
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Overdue stock transport order items created but not (fully) delivered") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items with overdelivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Stock transport order items with overdelivery") * 100

metrics.name: Partially delivered stock transport order items without 'Final delivery' set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Partially delivered stock transport order items without 'Final delivery' set") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany billing document created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Intercompany billing document created") * 100

metrics.name: Overdue stock transport order items delivered but not (fully) issued
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Overdue stock transport order items delivered but not (fully) issued") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices received
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Supplier invoices received") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items with goods receipt created later than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Stock transport order items with goods receipt created later than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Overdue stock transport order items issued but not (fully) received
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Overdue stock transport order items issued but not (fully) received") * 100

metrics.name: Received stock transport order items without 'Delivery completed' set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Received stock transport order items without 'Delivery completed' set") * 100

metrics.name: Partially delivered stock transport order items with 'Final delivery' set but 'Delivery completed' not set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Partially delivered stock transport order items with 'Final delivery' set but 'Delivery completed' not set") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items delivered (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Stock transport order items delivered") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items delivered (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Stock transport order items delivered")

metrics.name: Stock transport order items issued (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Stock transport order items issued") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items issued (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Stock transport order items issued")

metrics.name: Stock transport order items received (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Stock transport order items received") * 100

metrics.name: Stock transport order items received (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Stock transport order items received")

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items created") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items created")

metrics.name: FI-AP items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AP items created") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AP items created")

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AP items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AP items cleared")

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items cleared")

metrics.name: Create stock transport order item with reference to stock transport requisition & with availability check
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create stock transport order item with reference to stock transport requisition & with availability check')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create stock transport order item with reference to stock transport requisition & without availability check
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create stock transport order item with reference to stock transport requisition & without availability check')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create stock transport order item without reference to stock transport requisition & with availability check
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create stock transport order item without reference to stock transport requisition & with availability check')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create stock transport order item without reference to stock transport requisition & without availability check
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create stock transport order item without reference to stock transport requisition & without availability check')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create stock transport order item - others
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create stock transport order item - others')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create replenishment delivery
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create replenishment delivery')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods issue in supplying plant for stock transport order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods issue in supplying plant for stock transport order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt in receiving plant for stock transport order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt in receiving plant for stock transport order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create intercompany invoice for replenishment delivery
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create intercompany invoice for replenishment delivery')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create supplier invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create supplier invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create open item in FI-AR
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create open item in FI-AR')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create open item in FI-AP
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create open item in FI-AP')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear open item in FI-AP
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear open item in FI-AP')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear open item in FI-AR
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear open item in FI-AR')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
